endemo2.general.country_containers.Population¶

class Population(country_level_population, nuts2, nuts2_used=False)[source]¶

Bases: object

Holds information about a countries’ population. Contains per-country data, as well as nuts2 data

Variables:

  • country_level_population (PredictedTimeseries) – The timeseries containing population information and predictions on a country level.

  • nuts2 (NutsRegion) – The root of the Nuts2 Tree for a country.

  • nuts2_used (bool) – Decides, which type of population should be used for getters.

Methods

__init__

get_country_historical_data

Getter for the country-level historical data.

get_country_prog

Getter for the country-level prognosis.

get_data

Getter for data based on whether nuts2_used is true or not.

get_nuts2_prog

Getter for the nuts2 prognosis.

get_nuts2_root

Getter for the nuts2 regions root node object.

get_prog

Getter for population prognosis based on whether nuts2_used is true or not.

get_data()[source]¶

Getter for data based on whether nuts2_used is true or not.

Returns:

Nuts2 population data if nuts2_used is true, otherwise country level data.

Getter for population prognosis based on whether nuts2_used is true or not.

float

Nuts2 population prognosis if nuts2_used is true, otherwise country level data.
